apple_vendor_description: On Apple devices, this emoji portrays two men in a tender embrace, their faces close for a kiss, rendered with Apple’s signature smooth gradients and soft, rounded edges. The medium and dark skin tones are depicted with a subtle sheen and realistic lighting, highlighting the warmth and intimacy of the moment. This representation of affection and connection is a beautiful addition to conversations, symbolizing love and partnership with a touch of Apple’s polished visual storytelling.
